com.google.auth.appengine

Class AppEngineCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.auth.Credentials
      • com.google.auth.oauth2.OAuth2Credentials
        • com.google.auth.oauth2.GoogleCredentials
          • com.google.auth.appengine.AppEngineCredentials
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceAccountSigner, Serializable

    public class AppEngineCredentials
extends GoogleCredentials
implements ServiceAccountSigner
    OAuth2 credentials representing the built-in service account for Google App ENgine.

    Fetches access tokens from the App Identity service.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
